meta.title: Premium Precision Milled Golf Putters | Ping PLD
meta.description: Ping PLD milled putters are crafted from stainless steel and precisely designed to ensure your best performance.

pageBanner.label: PLD Milled
pageBanner.title: Premium, Precision-Milled Putters
pageBanner.scrollButtonAria: Scroll down to the next section

featuredSection.title: Mediculously Milled
featuredSection.description: Clean, sharp lines with gracefully sloping contours. A premium level of precision and detail. These are the qualities that distinguish a PLD Milled design, carefully crafted from 303 stainless steel to ensure quality and performance.
